scenario_text.value:
(The next thing I knew, we were all back in
the gym. Along with our partners, of course.)

(More than anything, this was a sign that
we’d earned Zhuqiaomon’s blessing.)

Aw yes! We got the power of all the Holy
Beasts! That just leaves the last battle!
Ahaha... Ha...
I’m hungry.
Heheh... Hahaha!
Oh, Minoru!
Hey, it’s not his fault. That was rough!
It’s settled, then. Let’s all have dinner!

Sounds good! I’ll have everything ready in no
time.
I’ll help too!

Hey, what do you say we all help with dinner
today?
Sounds great to me! I say we all get cookin’!
Me too!

(Having learned who the Master is, we know
what pain and sadness he had to bear.)

(But that hasn’t changed our resolve. We’re
going to save Miyuki, and both worlds.)

(All that remains is our final confrontation
with the Master, to calm his rage and hate.)

(I’m sure it will be a fight like no other.
But before that, right now...)
Let’s all make dinner!
Yeah!!!
